question: Analyze the technology adoption trends among companies in the healthcare industry over the past year.

subtasks.task: Retrieve a list of all companies operating in the healthcare industry and their corresponding technology stacks.
Gather data on technology services and products used by these healthcare companies from the CompanyVendorTechDetail and CompanyVendorProductDetail tables.
Analyze the adoption trends by summarizing the frequency of each technology used and any relevant financial metrics, such as IT budgets or revenues linked to these technologies.
Compile findings and create visual representations of the trends in technology adoption across the healthcare industry based on the previous analyses.
